text: Is there an unspoken truth you believe defines our friendship?
Can you recall a time you felt most seen or understood by me?
Do you harbor any fears for me that you rarely voice?
In what specific ways do you think we contribute to each other's growth?
Describe a shared memory that still brings a genuine laugh to you.
If our friendship had a theme song, which would it be and why?
Pinpoint the moment you realized our friendship would be significant.
How have I surprised you most over the years?
How would you describe the evolution of our friendship?
Which aspect of our connection do you value most deeply?
Is there something you've always wanted to tell me but haven't found the right moment?
Which quality in me do you admire the most, and why?
How effectively do you think we navigate conflicts or disagreements?
Share a dream you have for the future of our friendship.
Can you think of a time I needed you most, even if I didn't explicitly say so?
Describe the unique role I play in your life.
Is there a hard truth about myself you believe I need to hear, delivered with a friend's care?
Imagine we'd never met; what do you think we'd each be missing out on?
Share an initial assumption you made about me that turned out to be incorrect.
How has our friendship shaped your understanding of true connection?
